definition: a gambling game using cards, to exert pressure on someone through threats
details:
noun
- a gambling game using cards
= synonyms: twenty-one, vingt-et-un
- a flag usually bearing a white skull and crossbones on a black background
= synonyms: black flag, pirate flag, Jolly Roger
- a piece of metal covered by leather with a flexible handle
= synonyms: cosh, sap
- a common scrubby deciduous tree of central and southeastern United States having dark bark and broad three-lobed (club-shaped) leaves
= synonyms: blackjack oak, jack oak
verb
- to exert pressure on someone through threats
= example: to exert pressure on someone through threats
= synonyms: pressure
